description.value: Choose two of the following formulas: @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Bestial Mutagen (Lesser)]{Bestial Mutagen (Lesser)}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Cognitive Mutagen (Lesser)]{Cognitive Mutagen (Lesser)}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Juggernaut Mutagen (Lesser)]{Juggernaut Mutagen (Lesser)}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Quicksilver Mutagen (Lesser)]{Quicksilver Mutagen (Lesser)}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Serene Mutagen (Lesser)]{Serene Mutagen (Lesser)}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Silvertongue Mutagen (Lesser)]{Silvertongue Mutagen (Lesser)}
